sub_title: Founder Rise & Lead Women and Co-Founder Ataro Group| Entrepreneur| Mentor| Educator| Speaker
summary:
As the visionary force behind Rise & Lead Women, Ebere is at the forefront of a global movement aiming to amplify the representation of women in top leadership roles within workplaces and the broader marketplace while shaping the future of inclusive leadership.

With over 25 years of rich business management and leadership experience, Ebere's entrepreneurial spirit shines through her multifaceted ventures, from multi-branch restaurants and an innovative event tech platform to Ataro Foods, amassing invaluable insights every step.

Ebere is not just an entrepreneur; she's an inspiration. Known by many as a role model and pacesetter, she firmly believes that authentic leadership transcends titles—it's about influencing change, driving results, and making an indelible impact.

With deep expertise in strategic leadership, Ebere has always strived to usher in growth and transformation for businesses, communities, and individuals. Her bespoke consulting approach ensures that companies have actionable strategies to foster gender-inclusive growth and competitive advantage. Her signature "Rise To Leadership Program" is a game-changer, helping women in mid-management to unearth tools and mindsets that will accelerate their leadership journey and transform their mindset and career trajectory.

Ebere’s passion extends beyond the boardroom. Through initiatives like the BIEL Foundation, she epitomizes leadership that serves, uplifts and transforms communities. Through Ataro Foods, she's committed to preserving, promoting, and celebrating the rich flavours of African cuisine. 

Connect with Ebere to champion women's leadership, learn from her cross-industry knowledge, and shape a more inclusive and equitable world.

treasury_media.title: Rise to Leadership Program 2023
treasury_media.description: Rise to Leadership Program is a self-leadership mastery program for professionals who desire to show up with authenticity, make an impact or get a seat at the decision-making table.

treasury_media.title: Rise & Lead Summit
treasury_media.description: Every year we gather some of the most inspiring and authentic leaders for a 2-day event to share ideas and knowledge. We set the tone for companies and individuals as senior executives and experts share their wisdom, knowledge and strategies around current DEI trends, leadership and business development and provide actionable insights. Save your seat today!

treasury_media.title: Rise and Lead Women Collaborates with UPS to Empower Women Entrepreneurs in Europe and Africa
treasury_media.description: According to a study by the European Commission and the International Trade Centre, women in Europe are largely under-represented in international trade. For context, only 20% of exporting companies in the entire European Union are owned, led or...

treasury_media.title: Six ways leaders can confront institutional racism
treasury_media.description: “Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.” — Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

profile_positions.description: Rise & Lead Institute is a leadership development platform designed to support diverse women in senior to executive management roles to accelerate their leadership journeys and become leaders who make an impact. We offer courses that leverage the experiences and wisdom of executive women and coaches who understand what it takes to succeed in corporate and business leadership.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Program Chair

profile_positions.description: Rise and Lead offers women resources for both personal and professional development to become leaders.  Through our sponsorship of events, webinars, and mentoring sessions, we connect aspiring leaders with experienced business executives to explore topics that are essential to professional growth and development.  We share stories that inspire action, exchange knowledge in an environment of trust and empower women to reach their full potential.  Rise and Lead advocates for women to become leaders, thus accelerating gender balanced leadership within this community.
profile_positions.title: Founder & President

profile_positions.description: Ataro Group Limited is a West African-inspired food brand that brings bold, healthy, and convenient spice blends and sauces to the world. We are globalising the taste of West Africa and making it accessible through our spice blends, sauces and many more products in the pipeline.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & CEO

profile_positions.description: I owned and managed two restaurants branches with 7 catering outlets, large catering operations and a commercial bakery that employed over 56 employees. My team are currently providing event management services to oil servicing companies while I still offer virtual supervision to the team.
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description: My very first job where I worked as executive assistant to the District Operations Manager.
profile_positions.title: Executive Assistant To Operations Manager

company.name: British School in the Netherlands' International Team of the Family Association

volunteer_experiences.description: Responsible for organising the Nigerian Community in the BSN to participate in events relating to culture, food and raising funds for charity.

Beauty in Every Life is a non-profit initiative that is focused on promoting the well-being of women and children in Nigeria and African Migrants in Netherlands, and helps them to maximise their potential. BIEL is registered in Nigeria and the Netherlands. 

At Beauty in Every life, we believe that human potential can be harnessed through education and personal development. We launched a campaign called “Keep Dignity Alive” to prevent the trafficking of women and children in Nigeria through awareness, education and empowerment.

To donate to our cause, visit www.beautyineverylife.org

or order Vibrant West African Cuisine cookbook, visit www.atarofoods.com/vibrantcookbook

100% of proceeds go to BIEl Initiative, Nigeria.
